room_title: Escape room "Tesla Room" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: Interesting story and great realization! Very challenging room

room_title: Escape room "Tesla Room" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: Feel like in scientific lab.  Very well conveyed the atmosphere. And smart puzzles. I want to visit other rooms. Continue in the same spirit guys, keep it up!

room_title: Escape room "Tesla Room" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: I enjoyed quest rooms in Europe. I like high-quality, sophisticated quests to spend past time with friends and colleagues. Quest Shark delivers on every level.

room_title: Escape room "Tesla Room" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: It was little scary things in Horror Version of this room which we choosed..and we really liked it! A lot of fun! We wanna come to another rooms for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Tesla Room" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: We really enjoyed the game. A lot of hidden clues and lockers with different codes.  A lot of challenging tasks. Not easy room but for sure worth to visit
